name: ex-ts-mongoose
description: - create new folder and open vs code - npm init -y - npm i -D typescript ts-node nodemon - npm i express cookie-parser compression cors mongoose - npm i -D @types/express @types/cookie-parser @types/compression @types/cors @types/mongoose - npx tsc --init {     "compilerOptions": {         "forceConsistentCasingInFileNames": true,         "strict": true,         "module": "NodeNext",         "moduleResolution": "nodenext",         "baseUrl": "src",         "outDir": "dist",         "sourceMap": true,         "noImplicitAny": true     },     "include": [         "src/**/*"     ] } - optional create: nodemon.json {     "watch": ["src"],     "ext": ".ts, .js",     "exec": "ts-node ./src/index.ts" } - tambah pada file: package.json   "scripts": {     "start": "nodemon",   }, - npm start
